amendatorysection.para: As used in sections 28-416, 29-422, 29-424, 29-425, 29-431 to 29-434, 48-1231, and 53-173, unless the context otherwise requires, infraction means the violation of any law, ordinance, order, rule, or regulation, not including those related to traffic, which is not otherwise declared to be a misdemeanor or a felony. Infraction includes violations of section 60-6,267.

crossreference.para: Child passenger restraint system, violation, see sections 60-6,267, 60-6,268, and 71-1907.
